occupation: Personal assistant, odd jobs and cleaning houses
description: I am known as most amazing kind hearted sweetheart by friends and family. Strong, independent,outgoing and confident woman. Very respectful, honest, faithful, understanding and I actually care about someone’s well being. I have a huge heart of gold and I go above and beyond to show much love and care I have. I love and enjoy doing good deeds. Strong believer in compassion makes the world a better place. Known as being a one of a kind. I am proud of the woman I am today and I fought hard to become her.
